availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Peter M. Reaves (Warren County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Reaves. Father of Zerelda Reaves. Farmer in Warren County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 72.
Find A Grave, "Peter M. Reeves (October 19, 1810-April 4, 1882)," Memorial #39606647, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/39606647 (accessed August 16, 2018).
